member.name: IAppxManifestPackageDependency2.GetMaxMajorVersionTested
member.summary: Returns the maximum major version number of the package that is tested to be compatible with the current package.
member.param: The maximum major version number of the dependency package that has been tested to be compatible with the current package.
member.returns: If this method succeeds, it returns S_OK. Otherwise, it returns an HRESULT error code.

member.name: IAppxManifestPackageDependency2
member.summary: Describes the dependency of one package on another package.
